channel.title: IRC Dating Sim - gikid
channel.description:
The unmarked lines are me asking the questions on IRC. Gikid's providing the answers, and though I didn't put them here, you can figure out what he picked from the results. I just made this up as I went along. I'm Sepictic at the end.
Hello I am doing dating sim simulation You see silab in a hotel
Option A : Greet her cheerfully and introduce yourself. Option B : Introduce yourself and ask her out for a date. Option C : Drag her into a broomcloset and jam it in. Please choose an option.
You introduce yourself to MissSilabSoft and ask her for a date. Since this is a dating sim simulation, she
asks you where you would like to go.
Option A: The movie theater Option B: McDonalds Option C: Love hotel
You have arrived at the movie theater with MissSilabSoft. What do you go?
Option A: Go see what's playing Option B: Go get some refreshments Option C: Threesome with the bathroom attendant
You decide to go see what's playing. Which movie will you watch with MissSilabSoft?
Option A: Sappy romantic movie Option B: Horror movie Option C: Sci-fi movie
You decide to see a sappy romantic movie. You have reached the halfway point of the movie. What do you do?
Option A: Pull the yawn-arm-over-shoulder move Option B: 'Accidentally' grab her left boob Option C: Continue watching movie
The movie has ended. It was a rather uneventful night, and you're disappointed.
Option A: Continue the date Option B: Take her home Option C: Buttsecks
You take her home and walk her up to the door. She starts fiddling with her keys. What do you do?
Option A: Ask her to go out again sometime Option B: Kiss her Option C: Go home
You kiss her and she kisses you back.
Option A: Insert tongue Option B: Insert penis Option C: Finish kiss
You have ended the kiss. She seems disappointed. What do you do?
Option A: Insert tongue Option B: Insert penis Option C: Ask to go inside Option D: Go home
You ask to go inside her house and she lets you in. She leads you to her bedroom. What do you do?
Option A: "It's too early!" Option B: Go inside bedroom Option C: Premature ejaculation
You go inside her bedroom. She takes her coat off and sits on the bed. She pats the area next to her on
the bed. What do you do?
Option A: Sit down Option B: Take off pants and underwear and start fapping Option C: Feel her up
You sit down next to her on the bed. She reaches over you to grab her phone, and on the way back grazes
over your groin. What do you do?
Option A: Get boner Option B: Kiss her Option C: Bone her
You get a boner. The front of your jeans starts rising up. She stares at it intently, and then unzips your
zipper. She reaches into your pants and starts stroking her hand over your boner. What do you do?
Option A: Touch her boobs Option B: Run out of house Option C: Premature ejaculation Option D: Push her down on the bed
You start tweaking her boobs through her sweater. She moans and her nipples begin getting erect. You
gently move your hands across her breasts and then squeeze and pinch. She moves her head down towards your
cock and begins to gently lick around the tip. What do you do?
Option A: Take off her sweater Option B: Cum in her mouth Option C: Pull her head deeper and make her deep-throat you
You take off her sweater. She's left in her skirt and a green button-up sweater. She becomes rougher and
rougher on your cock and you can't help but cum.
Option A: Cum in her mouth Option B: Cum on her face Option C: Cum on her clothes Option D: 'Angry Pirate'
You cum in her mouth. Her eyes widen for a moment but then they close. She tilts her head back and
swallows all of your cum. She licks her lips and stares at your cock, and then takes her shirt and skirt
off and is left in her underwear. She's wearing a lacy blue bra and matching panties. What do you do?
Option A: Take off all of your clothes Option B: Get hard again Option C: Thank her for the night and go home
You take off all of your clothes and get hard again from looking at her almost-naked body. She sits on
your lap. What do you do?
Option A: Nudge her panties aside and fuck her Option B: Take her bra off Option C: Move with her to her computer chair and load MoparScape
You take her bra off and her breasts bounce, free of their restraints. She moans and grinds herself
against your boner. What do you do?
Option A: Take off her panties and bone her Option B: Nudge her panties aside and fuck her Option C: Suck on the back of her neck while playing with her breasts
You suck on the back of her neck and play with her breasts. She rips her panties off and positions herself
above your cock. What do you do?
Option A: Pull her down on your boner Option B: Wait for her to act Option C: Reposition her and go for the anal home run
You pull her down on your boner and start pumping up. She starts bouncing on your cock and moaning while playing with her breasts. You're about to cum, what do you do?
Option A: Cum inside her Option B: Cum on her back Option C: Cum in her anus Option D: Cum on her breasts Option E: Cum in her mouth Option F: Cum outside of a conveniently opened window
You pull out of her and cum on her breasts. She grabs her boobs and licks your cum off of them. She lays down on her bed. You feel sleepy, what do you do?
Option A: Fall asleep with her in her bed Option B: Go home and crash on your couch Option C: Suicide by jumping out of second story window
You decide to sleep in her bed. You turn off the lights and latch yourself to her. You have a hard time falling asleep thinking about how you had sex. After several hours, you fall asleep dreaming of her. You wake up the next morning missing a kidney.
BAD END
And the aftermath:
<gikid> B then <Sepictic> She pulls a syringe, knocks you out, continues with A minus the staying awake part. <gikid> LOL <gikid> Sepictic: HA! this is proof that I had REAL E-Sex with MissSilabSoft <ThugEpicLife> Suicide plz <gikid> MissSilabSoft: did you liek it? <gikid> MissSilabSoft: did you liek it? <gikid> DID YOU LIKE MY MASSIVE COCK IN YOUR TIGHT VIRGIN PUSSY? <gikid> oman <Airchair> jesus <Airchair> christ <Airchair> gikid <gikid> lol <Airchair> get off irc now <Airchair> ty <gikid> lolol <Airchair> honestly, that's fucking sick how you just said that <gikid> Airchair: I lol'd irl <ThugEpicLife> gikid, she gets enough of that off moparscapers <gikid> oshi.....
